#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,i,t;
	t=0;
	while(cin>>n && n!=0)
	{
		t++;
		int sum,avg,diff;
		sum=avg=diff=0;
		int a[51];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		avg=sum/n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if((avg-a[i])>0)
				diff+=(avg-a[i]);
		}
        cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl;
        cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<diff<<"."<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
